name: textView(_:shouldInteractWith:in:)
desc: Asks the delegate whether the specified text view allows user interaction with the provided text attachment in the specified range of text.DeprecatedUse textView(_:shouldInteractWith:in:interaction:) instead.
declaration:
optional func textView(_ textView: UITextView, 
    shouldInteractWith textAttachment: NSTextAttachment, 
                    in characterRange: NSRange) -> Bool
